cause.description:
My fellow Bengalis, too long have we suffered from the slings and arrows of outrageous Pakis claiming they smell of roses while we merely smell! It's time to take action
1. Bad body odor is universal
2. Bengalis are part of the universe
3. Therefore, Bengalis smell! Wait, no something went wrong there...
cause.mission: eradicate offensive body odor in Dhaka
cause.name: Campaign for an Odor-Free Dhaka
